helio.materialiser.evaluator

Class H2Evaluator

  • java.lang.Object
    • helio.materialiser.evaluator.H2Evaluator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Evaluator

    public class H2Evaluator
extends java.lang.Object
implements Evaluator
    H2Evaluator allows to evaluate expressions, a composite of functions that can return a String value as result or a Boolean value (a predicate expression)

    H2Evaluator is based on the H2 and Hikari database engine, @see Documentation link for check the already implemented functions

    To extend H2Evaluator functions a class must extend the abstract Functions class, and then the method implementing the desired functionality must be static. All the static function in such new class will be registered in this evaluator and will be invokable

    Author:
    Andrea Cimmino
